attributes.action: help prevent the discrimination and stereotypes made by the media, police and other government authroties against the youthful population of britian aged between 13-19, otherwise known as "Teenagers"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is to ask the media, the government and the Prime Minister to stop stereotyping and discriminating against teenagers.

I myself am a teenager aged 14.
I do not wish to have any of the nonsense such as "He's too young, he does not know what he's doing"

I know full well what i am doing and hope to gain many supporters for my new campaign.

Alexander Chadwick
